title.en: Professional Development Portfolio of Vocational Teacher

description.en: During the course, the students will finalize the portfolio, providing evidence of their professional competence in six areas: planning the learning process, design the learning environment, supporting learning and learner development, reflection and professional self-development and developing the image of vocational education.
description.et:
Õppeaine raames viimistlevad üliõpilased stuudiumi vältel loodud arenguportfoolio, tõendades oma kutsekompetentse
kuues valdkonnas: õppeprotsessi planeerimine, õpikeskkonna kujundamine, õppimise ja õppija arengu toetamine, refleksioon ja professionaalne enesearendamine, erialaõppe arendamine ja kutseõppe maine kujundamine.

objectives.en: To support the vocational teacher students in creating the vocational teacher development portfolio.
objectives.et: Toetada kutseõpetaja eriala üliõpilasi kutseõpetaja arenguportfoolio koostamisel.

learning_outcomes.en: 1) prepares a digital development portfolio structured on the basis of the competences listed in the professional standard of vocational teacher, level 6;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) koostab digitaalse arenguportfoolio, mis on struktureeritud kutseõpetaja tase 6 kutsestandardis loetletud kompetentside põhjal;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) selects appropriate evidence to demonstrate competences;
